mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM qna WHERE WRT_YMD = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLIENT WHERE CRE_YMD = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') AND sts_code = 'CR001'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CONTRACT WHERE EXP_YMD = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') AND sts_code = 'CR003'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pay_his WHERE PAY_YMD = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') AND sts_code = 'PY003'
SELECT client.cl_name, qna.title, qna.content, qna.wrt_ymd FROM qna, client WHERE qna.WRT_YMD = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') AND qna.CL_CODE = client.CL_CODE
select id, cl_name, cl_ceo from client where cre_ymd = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') AND sts_code = 'CR001'
select client.id, client.cl_name, client.cl_ceo from contract, client where contract.cl_code = client.cl_code and contract.exp_ymd = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')
select client.cl_name, pay_his.pay_amt from pay_his, payment, client where pay_his.pay_ymd = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') and pay_his.pay_no = payment.pay_no and payment.co_code = client.cl_code
select count(*) from in_order where co_code = #{cl_code} and deli_ymd = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD') and sts_code = 'PR002'
select count(*) from release where co_code = #{cl_code} and plan_ymd = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD')
select count(*) from c2c_contract where co_code = #{cl_code} and sts_code = 'CR002'
select count(*) from msg where RC_CODE = (select cl_code from client where cl_code = #{cl_code}) and read_yn=0

select (select cl_name from client where wh_code=cl_code) cl_name, wh_mngr, ord_mngr, req_ymd, deli_ymd from in_order where co_code = 'CO1000' and sts_code = 'PR002' and deli_ymd = to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD')

select (select cl_name from client where client.cl_code=release.wh_code) cl_name, (select cl_name from client where client.cl_code = release.dst_code) dst_name, (select emp_name from wh_emp where release.emp_id = wh_emp.emp_id) emp_name, plan_ymd from release where co_code= #{cl_code} and plan_ymd = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT ord_no, deli_ymd, (SELECT item_name FROM item WHERE item_no = (SELECT MAX(item_no) FROM order_item WHERE ord_no = in_order.ord_no) AND co_code =#{cl_code} ) item_name FROM in_order WHERE co_code = #{cl_code}
select (select cl_name from client where wh_code=cl_code) cl_name, (select cl_name from client where client.cl_code = release.dst_code) dst_name, plan_ymd from release where co_code=#{cl_code}
SELECT count(rls_no) FROM release WHERE sts_code = 'PR001' and wh_code = #{wh_code}
SELECT count(ord_no) FROM in_order WHERE sts_code = 'PR001' and wh_code = #{wh_code}
SELECT count(ord_no) FROM in_order WHERE sts_code = 'PR002' and deli_ymd = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') and wh_code = #{wh_code}
SELECT count(rls_no) FROM release WHERE sts_code = 'PR005' and plan_ymd = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') and wh_code = #{wh_code}
SELECT count(cc_no) FROM c2c_contract WHERE wh_code = #{wh_code} and sts_code = 'CR001'

SELECT rownum, item_no, item_name, std_name, qty AS plan_qty, cl_name FROM( SELECT oi.item_no, item_name, std_name, qty, cl_name FROM in_order io, item it, order_item oi, client cl, standard st WHERE io.wh_code = #{wh_code} and io.sts_code = 'PR002' and deli_ymd = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD') and oi.item_no = it.item_no and io.ord_no = oi.ord_no and oi.co_code = cl.cl_code and it.std_no = st.std_no ORDER BY item_name)

SELECT rownum, item_no, item_name, std_name, plan_qty, cl_name FROM( SELECT ri.item_no, item_name, std_name, plan_qty, cl_name FROM release rl, rls_item ri, item it, standard st, client cl WHERE rl.rls_no = ri.rls_no and rl.sts_code = 'PR005' and plan_ymd = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD') and rl.wh_code = #{wh_code} and ri.item_no = it.item_no and it.std_no = st.std_no and rl.co_code = cl.cl_code ORDER BY item_name)

SELECT item_no, std_name, item_name, plan_qty, cl_name, plan_ymd, req_ymd, rownum FROM( SELECT it.item_no, std_name, item_name, qty AS plan_qty, cl_name, deli_ymd AS plan_ymd, io.req_ymd FROM in_order io, order_item oi, client cl, item it, standard st WHERE io.sts_code = 'PR001' and io.wh_code = #{wh_code} and io.ord_no =oi.ord_no and oi.item_no = it.item_no and io.co_code = cl.cl_code and it.std_no = st.std_no)

SELECT item_no, std_name, item_name, plan_qty, cl_name, plan_ymd, req_ymd, rownum FROM( SELECT it.item_no, std_name, item_name, plan_qty, cl_name, plan_ymd, ri.reg_ymd req_ymd FROM release rl, rls_item ri, client cl, item it, standard st WHERE rl.sts_code = 'PR001' and wh_code = #{wh_code} and rl.rls_no = ri.rls_no and ri.item_no = it.item_no and rl.co_code = cl.cl_code and it.std_no = st.std_no)
